name: fsnd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: 3syl(w0, wf(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c2)), wf1(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c2)), wf1(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2))
-| wi(wf1(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2), wf(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2))

|- wi(w0, wf(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2))

-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c2)), wf1(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2))
-| wi(wf1(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2), wf(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0), c2))

comment: A singleton of an ordered pair is a function. (Contributed by AV, 17-Apr-2021.)
